description:
There hasn't been anything lighter or better than this app since it was released. I love running this on .e16 and prefer the "invisible" theme.

You can have as many instances as you like running simultaneously, each with it's own theme. Perfect for monitoring large systems and elegant enough for every desktop. I use it because I detest "panels". This is an extremely configurable heartbeat of your system and has graced my desktops since my 1st pc ever.

Installed and wanted to display for me only , CPU temp, WLAN activity and CPU fan.

Just right click on it and .... how to increase the fonts , application window ?

This has been around since slackware in the 90's and it's still peerless. At a glance you have all your system monitors, battery, uptime, # of users/procs, temp, voltage, click for drive mounts, mail check, date/time, and much more. Never been able to replace it.
системный монитор похожий на conky . очень хорошо настраиваемый , много разнообразных плагинов и тем
